author: farhan
title: WATER MINISTER MASAGOS INCREASES WATER PRICE DUE TO LESS RELIABLE WEATHER
text:
WATER MINISTER MASAGOS INCREASES WATER PRICE DUE TO LESS RELIABLE WEATHER   
<Credits: The Alternative View> Advertisement 
PAP Minister for Environment and Water Resources Masagos Zulkifli has announced that water prices will be revised upwards this year due to anticipated higher costs of producing water and the need to price water right in view of the less reliable weather. 
Currently, S'poreans are already paying FIVE levels of tariffs and taxes on water consumption comprising: 
1. Water tariff
